content.text:
# Ward's field mouse

| genus = Apodemus
| species = pallipes
| authority = (Barrett-Hamilton, 1900)
| synonyms =
Apodemus wardi
}}
'''Ward's field mouse (Apodemus pallipes''')  is a species of rodent in the family Muridae.
It is found in Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, Afghanistan, India, Iran, Nepal, and Pakistan.
